name: All Alone: VR
description: The main goal in All Alone is to find the way out of such forgotten town.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: gtx 970 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 Storage: 500 MB available space
